name: Knighty Night Castle!
description:
Play through this small fantasy game as a huge monster whose goal is to eat all the residents in the castle. Use bounce pads to get to your targets and then get to the door to the next room. 

Made in 2 hours and 54 minutes for the 173 weekly trijam gamejam the theme for this week was you are the monster. I hope you have fun with my game!

Character sprites by 0SX in his 16 x 16 Dungeon tileset 2

Fireball by Vimlark in his Asset Pack

Tileset by rotting pixels in his Castle Platformer Tileset [16x16]
